name: Hidden Shadow
description:
Rotate weapons and place them in the right spot. You gotta pick up a weapon and leave it in the spot someone else left simmilar weapon, which casted the same shadow. 

Game is not finished. There are only some puzzle chambers to play with. No victory screen, just try to fit all 7 shadows with missing objects.

REMEMBER! There are often several ways to rotate given object to create the same shadow!!


Controls:

WSAD - move. LeftMouseButton - PickUp / PickDown hovered item (glows like lava). Hold RightMouseButton - rotate item with mouse movement. Mouse Wheel - rotate item. Hold LeftCtrl - slow and precise rotations.

Credits:

Unreal Engine, Infinity Blade, SoundBible.
